improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: Determine the sentiment of a given body of text with unparalleled accuracy for English language texts. Our cutting-edge technology excels in detecting emotions and tone, providing you with precise results every time. However, please note that our expertise lies primarily within the realm of English language analysis, and we may not perform as well when dealing with non-English languages or more nuanced sentiment analysis tasks.
name: sentiment_analysis_service_analyze_english_text
